name: Wiggly Snake [PICO-8]
description:
Wiggly Snake

What if snake was really wiggly...?

Made in PICO-8

Inspired by Snake (duh) and Slither.io

How to play

Eat the apples to grow longer.

If you hit the edge, you die and restart.

If you hit yourself, you bite off your tail from that point.

Controls

Left to turn anticlockwise.

Right to turn clockwise.

Future plans

Sound effects

Background texture

Optimisations (starts to run slower after 3800 points)

Any suggestions?
